mapper.select: select u.uid, u.username, es.subjectName, s.choiceScore, s.totalJudgeScore, s.totalShortScore from score s inner join user u on s.id=u.scoreId inner join exam_subject es on u.subjectId=es.subjectId where u.uid=#{uid}

select ams.user.username, ams.user.name, ams.exam_subject.subjectName,ams.score.* from ams.score inner join ams.user on user.uid = score.uid inner join exam_subject on ams.exam_subject.subjectId = ams.score.subjectId where ams.score.status = 1
mapper.update: update ams.user set status = 0 where ams.user.uid = #{id}
update ams.score set ams.score.choicescore = #{choicescore},ams.score.totaljudgescore = #{totaljudgescore}, ams.score.totalshortscore = #{totalshortscore} where id = #{id}

update ams.score set ams.score.status = 0 where ams.score.id in
